contentrichtext.text: '''Nochnoy dozor''' ({{lang-ru|Ночной дозор}}, ''Nochnoi dozor'', ''Nochnoj dozor'', '''Night Watch''') '''Nochnoy Dozor''' may mean: *[[Night Watch (Russian novel)|''Night Watch'' (Russian novel)]], 1998 opening of Sergei Lukyanenko's Watch fantasy tetralogy *[[Night Watch (2004 film)|''Night Watch'' (2004 film)]], Russian blockbuster based on Lukyanenko's novel *[[Night Watch (video game)|''Night Watch'' (video game)]], based on the world from the Russian novel by Lukyanenko and the film *[[Nochnoy Dozor (group)]], activist group in Estonia == See also == *[[Night Watch (disambiguation)]] {{disambig}}
